Reviews.Content: truly recommend hotel traveller enjoys quiet peaceful stay location personnel polite helpful friendly superclean comfortable nice spend time hotel venice anyway

Reviews.Content: stayed nearby hotel previous wasnt cracked glorious location favourite venice traditional comfortable clean welcoming pretending isnt venice standards value

Reviews.Title: “Ordinary, but OK”
Reviews.Author: Ullert
Reviews.Content: venice hotel free stayed 1 night length hotel ok bit smelly dampmould chose hotel due proximity car parking facilities breakfast incl free wifi friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Was above our expectations”
Reviews.Author: Sc0ttish_c0uple
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights week sized bathroom floor corridor looking fire escape plan bedroom looked largest floor looked size sleeping belongings time spent sightseeing etc nice clean bathroom views gardens left hotel happy service received receptionists staff helpful required location hotel directly grand canal noisy minutes walk bus station dropped airport bus restaurants near attractions venice easy walk definitely stay recommend booking directly hotel cheaper rate compared accommodation websites

Reviews.Title: “Does the job, just could do better for the price”
Reviews.Author: Mini026
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights saturday wednesday reviews tiny bathroom shower toilet curtain isolate tiny space showering im slim day eating breakfast 5 minutes power waiter didnt surprised curtains light hadnt approached hot drinks opportunity power couldnt hot drinks shrugged power 9pm 12 noon planned shutdown attitude lack dedication serving hot drinks appeared breakfast meant 5 minutes offer serve additionally unable dry hair hotel save power bill apologies compensation reception otherwise hotel served function tidy clean minutes walk smarter simply modern eg separate shower

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, clean, quiet and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Worthingwanderers
Reviews.Content: reasonably priced hotel real weve stayed venice times probably budget priced hotel weve stayed facilities youd expect 3star 2star hotel perfectly adequate shower basic toiletries comfortable double bed safe generous continental breakfast spotlessly clean quiet slept soundly night staff polite helpful walls lined padded damask material helped soundproofing definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Reliably Good”
Reviews.Author: FionaHoran
Reviews.Content: venice times booked hotel stayed ten ago remember hotel time prices absolute bargain venice hotel position reasonably close bus train stations pleasant street notice people complained experience venetian hotels budget hotel didnt desk chair wardrobe shelving bed en suite bathroom floor en suite bathrooms shower inside cubicle slightly annoying affair potentially drench rest bathroom weather pretty bad cold wet grateful hotel heated free wifi definite bonus staff desk password staff friendly polite continental breakfasts highlight european holiday ive rolls brioches yoghurts fruit juices cornflakes cheese etc book hotel confidence booking via website straightforward pleased chosen

Reviews.Title: “Little Gem in the heart of venice.”
Reviews.Author: adelenicola
Reviews.Content: seeking independent hotel friendly team look furthur hotel returned 5 day break venice mum stayed hotel location wonderful located canal near piazza roma bus terminus setting beautiful restaurants cafes located near hotel charming decorated typical italian style breakfast basic served dining attentive staff 3 terraces loved enjoy latte cold oct maybe time summer family run hotel location service recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: hotel connections train bus day staff helpful night staff kid smiling answered questions adding info exact answering night staff bother tv uncomfortable moments audible sighs

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel found hotel staff nice particular gentleman desk name dressed suit wearing red rimmed glasses friendly stayed 11 night nice except bed bed uncomfortable hotel clean enjoyed outside terrace set drank wine ate cheese convenient piazzale roma
